pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"注意：gitlab-runner 镜像支持 x86-64 和 ARM64(aarch64) 架构"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先下载 GitLab 的 GPG 公钥："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"curl -L https://packages.gitlab.com/runner/gitlab-runner/gpgkey | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/gitlab-runner.gpg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["再选择你的 Debian/Ubuntu 版本，文本框中内容写进 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/gitlab-runner.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/gitlab-runner.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 12",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"bionic"}],["Ubuntu 16.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"xenial"}]]}],"code":"deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/gitlab-runner.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{os_name}} {{release_name}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"安装 gitlab-runner:"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install gitlab-runner","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"centosrhel","children":"CentOS/RHEL"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/gitlab-runner.repo"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/gitlab-runner.repo","code":"[gitlab-runner]
name=gitlab-runner
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/el$releasever-$basearch/
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://packages.gitlab.com/gpg.key","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再执行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache
{{sudo}}yum install gitlab-runner","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: GitLab Runner 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
